sentences.sentence: This is not only a problem in developing countries. About half of all pregnancies globally are unintended.
sentences.translation: 这不仅是发展中国家的问题，全球约一半的怀孕都是意外怀孕。

sentences.sentence: This is not only a problem in developing countries, about half of all pregnancies globally are unintended.
sentences.translation: 这不仅是发展中国家的问题，全球约一半的怀孕是意外怀孕。

sentences.sentence: In one area, it made painstaking efforts to quantify fertility preference to derive figures for planned and unplanned pregnancies.
sentences.translation: 在一个领域，它付出了艰苦的努力来量化生育偏好，以得出计划生育和非计划生育的数据。
